accuracy.Description: Participant performance. Trials are automatically correct unless there is a false alarm or if the trial is a task trial and the participant gets it wrong.

Levels.false_negative: An incorrect non-press on a task target trial. Also referred to as a "miss".
Levels.false_positive: An incorrect button-press on a baseline trial. Also referred to as a "false alarm".
Levels.true_negative: A correct non-press on a baseline trial.
Levels.true_positive: A correct button-press on a task target trial. Also referred to as a "hit".

miniblock_number.Description: Index of the block to which each trial belongs

subcategory.Description: Subtype of the overall category (e.g., "car" under "objects").
